analysis.title: Global Market Outlook
analysis.content: Neutrality persists amid structural tariff relief. The GMS 52 print signifies a precarious equilibrium within the transition phase, where nascent liquidity convexity is tempered by negative market breadth. The judicial negation of tariff protocols alleviates protectionist friction, catalyzing relief in equities despite stagnant OGV vectors. While VIX compression facilitates tactical long exposure, the divergence in high-yield spreads underscores a lingering regime fragility. Maintain defensive positioning. [MARKET STATUS: DEFENSIVE]

reports.EN: Neutrality persists amid structural tariff relief. The GMS 52 print signifies a precarious equilibrium within the transition phase, where nascent liquidity convexity is tempered by negative market breadth. The judicial negation of tariff protocols alleviates protectionist friction, catalyzing relief in equities despite stagnant OGV vectors. While VIX compression facilitates tactical long exposure, the divergence in high-yield spreads underscores a lingering regime fragility. Maintain defensive positioning. [MARKET STATUS: DEFENSIVE]
reports.ES: Neutralidad estructural ante el alivio arancelario. El registro GMS 52 indica un equilibrio precario en la fase de transiciÃ³n, donde la convexidad de liquidez es limitada por la debilidad en la amplitud del mercado. La anulaciÃ³n judicial de aranceles reduce la fricciÃ³n en el nexo fiscal-monetario, impulsando la renta variable. No obstante, la divergencia en los diferenciales de alto rendimiento y el sentimiento cripto exigen cautela tÃ¡ctica hasta que el GMS supere el umbral de 55 puntos. [MARKET STATUS: DEFENSIVE]

reports.ID: Netralitas struktural di tengah pelonggaran tarif. Skor GMS 52 mengindikasikan keseimbangan prekarius dalam fase transisi, di mana konveksitas likuiditas tertahan oleh breadht pasar yang negatif. Pembatalan yudisial atas tarif mereduksi friksi fiskal-moneter, memicu reli ekuitas meskipun vektor OGV stagnan. Namun, divergensi dalam spread high-yield menegaskan kerapuhan rezim. Postur defensif tetap krusial hingga GMS melampaui ambang batas 55 untuk memitigasi risiko ekor. [MARKET STATUS: DEFENSIVE]

reports.DE: Strukturelle NeutralitÃ¤t nach Ende der Zollpolitik. Der GMS-Wert von 52 signalisiert ein prekÃ¤res Gleichgewicht in der Ãœbergangsphase, in der die LiquiditÃ¤tskonvexitÃ¤t durch mangelnde Marktbreite eingeschrÃ¤nkt bleibt. Die gerichtliche Aufhebung der ZÃ¶lle mindert fiskalisch-monetÃ¤re Reibungen und stÃ¼tzt Aktien, doch die Ausweitung der HY-Spreads mahnt zur Vorsicht. Solange der GMS-Schwellenwert von 55 nicht Ã¼berschritten wird, bleibt die regimebedingte FragilitÃ¤t das dominierende Risiko. [MARKET STATUS: DEFENSIVE]
reports.FR: NeutralitÃ© structurelle suite Ã  l'allÃ©gement douanier. Le score GMS 52 reflÃ¨te un Ã©quilibre prÃ©caire en phase de transition, oÃ¹ la convexitÃ© de la liquiditÃ© est bridÃ©e par une largeur de marchÃ© nÃ©gative. L'annulation judiciaire des tarifs rÃ©duit la friction du nexus fiscal-monÃ©taire, favorisant les actions malgrÃ© des vecteurs OGV stagnants. Cependant, l'Ã©largissement des spreads de rendement et la dÃ©gradation du sentiment crypto exigent une vigilance accrue jusqu'au seuil de 55. [MARKET STATUS: DEFENSIVE]

news.title: Supreme Court strikes down Trump tariffs, rebuking president's signature economic policy
Supreme Court Trump tariffs ruling could put U.S. on hook for $175 billion in refunds, estimate says
Trump says he's considering limited military strike against Iran
Fourth-quarter U.S. GDP up just 1.4%, badly missing estimate; inflation firms at 3%
Trump previewed weak GDP on Truth Social ahead of official data release
GDP grew way less than expected in Q4. Why many on Wall Street aren't worried

ID: Mahkamah Agung batalkan tarif Trump, kecam kebijakan ekonomi andalan presiden
Putusan Mahkamah Agung tentang tarif Trump dapat membuat AS harus mengembalikan $175 miliar dalam pengembalian dana, kata perkiraan
Trump mengatakan ia mempertimbangkan serangan militer terbatas terhadap Iran
PDB AS kuartal keempat naik hanya 1,4%, meleset dari perkiraan; inflasi menguat di 3%
Trump memprediksi PDB lemah di Truth Social sebelum rilis data resmi
PDB tumbuh jauh lebih sedikit dari yang diharapkan di Q4. Mengapa banyak orang di Wall Street tidak khawatir
